summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Bug Tracking System feature. Backend: 27/27 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All UI flows tested successfully. Fixed import error in Bugs.jsx (useAuthStore was imported as default instead of named export).
passed_tests: POST /api/bugs - Create bug with priority (200 OK)
PATCH /api/bugs/{bug_id} - Update bug in Draft status (200 OK)
PATCH /api/bugs/{bug_id} - Update non-draft bug rejected (400 Bad Request)
POST /api/bugs/{bug_id}/transition - Invalid transition rejected (400 Bad Request)
POST /api/bugs/{bug_id}/links - Add link to bug (200 OK)
Validation: Invalid severity rejected (400 Bad Request)
Validation: Invalid priority rejected (400 Bad Request)
Validation: Missing title rejected (422 Unprocessable Entity)
Validation: Missing description rejected (422 Unprocessable Entity)
Frontend: Bugs navigation button visible on Dashboard header
Frontend: Create Bug dialog opens and works
Frontend: Bug detail dialog shows correct information
Frontend: Status transition from detail dialog works
Frontend: Bug filters work (status, severity, linked/standalone)
Frontend: History tab shows status transitions
critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: Bugs.jsx had incorrect import - 'import useAuthStore from @/store' changed to 'import { useAuthStore } from @/store' (named export)
Bug model correctly implements soft delete with is_deleted flag
Status transitions are properly validated with BUG_STATUS_TRANSITIONS mapping
Frontend properly displays severity/status badges with appropriate colors
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
test_credentials: Test user: testuser@jarlpm.dev, session via POST /api/auth/test-login
seed_data_creation: Created test bugs during testing, cleaned up after tests. One existing bug remains: 'Test Bug - Login button not working' (High severity, Confirmed status)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Bug Tracking System is fully functional. Backend API supports: CRUD operations, status lifecycle (Draft→Confirmed→In Progress→Resolved→Closed), linking to Epics/Features/Stories, status history tracking, and filtering. Frontend has dedicated /bugs page with filters, create dialog, detail dialog with tabs (Details, Links, History), and status transitions. Test user: testuser@jarlpm.dev via Test Login button. Fixed import error in Bugs.jsx.
